title: If Boards was more like Stack Overflow
body:
"I'm trying to play AP Vayne, but building armor isn't increasing my true damage. How do I fix this?"

"ranked season ends tomorrow someone boost me quick pls"

"temo attack magic I not die fast red red"

"I've decided that I need to build 5 Tears and an Ohmwrecker for jungle Kennen, but only one Tear is stacking at a time. How do I stack all 5 by 10:00?"

"I'm trying to search for Pyke in champ select but whenever I press P it just opens the shop. What's going on?"

"Is there a rune that gives 900 AD per level?"

"How much base AD does Kled have at level 12?"

"How much base AP does Kled have at level 12?"

"I KEEP ASKING YOU PEOPLE HOW to INCREASse ME BASe AP plS NEEdD ANswer"

"Kled's base AD at level _eleven_ is a totally new and exciting concept, and answering that question makes me super pro at LoL."

"What's a potion?"

"how muich AD JKLed have at 12"

"Hi guys (and gals, too!)! Hope you're all doing great today! Anyway, I have a question. I've done a ton of research about this, but I just can't find the answer. How much base AD does Kled have at level 12? If someone can help me figure this out that would be fantastic. Thanks to anyone who can provide this information, and to all a wonderful day! Thanks again!"

Whenever you think Boards has problems, just remember that it could be worse. Much worse.
